dirgraph module¶

Define DirGraph extension of networkx.DiGraph class, just adding some sugar.

class dirgraph.DirGraph(data=None, **attr)[source]¶

Bases: networkx.classes.digraph.DiGraph

Extension of networkx.DiGraph class. Just adds syntactic sugar for determining graph properties.

is_adj(edge)[source]¶

Check whether a pair of nodes is adjacent.

Parameters:edge – pair of nodes
Returns:True if nodes are adjacent, False otherwise
is_dir_edge(edge)[source]¶

Check whether edge exists and is directed.

Parameters:edge – pair of nodes in [parent, child] order
Returns:True if edge exists and is directed, False otherwise
is_non_adj(edge)[source]¶

Check whether a pair of nodes is nonadjacent.

Parameters:edge – pair of nodes
Returns:True if nodes are distinct and nonadjacent, False otherwise
is_undir_edge(edge)[source]¶

Check whether edge exists and is undirected.

Parameters:edge – pair of nodes in [parent, child] order
Returns:True if edge exists and is directed, False otherwise
